## Discuss these questions and write your answers in the space provided below it.

1. Explain how random access works and why it is so fast.

\vspace{2cm}


2. What are the differences between an array and a Python list?

\vspace{2cm}


3. Explain the difference between the physical size and the logical size of an array.

\vspace{2cm}

4. Suppose you have an array of 32-bit integers with 64 elements. Compute the total memory size (in bytes) required to store this array. 


\vspace{2cm}

5. If the base address of an array is `10011101` (in base 2), what is the address of the item at index position 7? Assume each element has a constant size of 1. Give your answer in base 2.

\vspace{2cm}


6. State the run-time complexity for inserting an item when the insertion point is the
logical size of the array.

\vspace{2cm}
